meta.site_description: Simat Elkhair Voluntary Organization - Empowering Sudanese women through community, growth, and hope.

home.initiatives_desc: Discover our latest projects—sustainable agriculture, health outreach, youth engagement and more—making a real impact in Sudanese communities across the country.
home.aid_desc: Food, medicine, and essentials donated to families and those in need during crises. Our emergency response teams work around the clock to reach the most vulnerable communities.
home.projects_wells_desc: We've built clean water wells in rural communities to improve health and daily life. Access to clean water is a fundamental right that transforms entire communities.
home.projects_training_desc: Vocational programs for women and youth to build sustainable livelihoods. Our training centers provide hands-on learning in various trades and skills.
home.cta_desc: Your support helps us continue our mission of empowering Sudanese women and communities. Every contribution counts.

about.page_title: About Us - SEVO | Simat Elkhair Voluntary Organization
about.hero_subtitle: Simat Elkhair Voluntary Organization - Empowering Sudanese women through community, growth, and hope since 2009.
about.intro_p1: Simat Elkhair Voluntary Organization (SEVO) was founded in 2009 with a simple mission: to empower Sudanese women and strengthen communities through sustainable development programs.
about.intro_p2: What started as a small community initiative has grown into a nationwide organization with over 350 active volunteers and countless success stories across Sudan.
about.mission_desc: To empower Sudanese women and communities through education, health services, economic opportunities, and sustainable development initiatives that create lasting positive change.
about.vision_desc: A Sudan where every woman has the opportunity to thrive, every community has access to clean water and healthcare, and sustainable development creates prosperity for all.
about.values_desc: Integrity, transparency, community participation, gender equality, and sustainable development guide everything we do at SEVO.
about.history_2009_desc: SEVO was founded by a group of passionate volunteers dedicated to helping women in rural Sudan.
about.history_2012_desc: Completed our first clean water well project, providing safe water to over 500 families.
about.history_2015_desc: Opened our first vocational training center, empowering women with marketable skills.
about.history_2018_desc: Launched mobile health clinics reaching remote communities across three states.
about.history_2022_desc: Expanded operations to all regions of Sudan, serving over 50 communities.
about.partners_desc: We collaborate with local and international organizations to maximize our impact.

impact.page_title: Our Impact - SEVO | Simat Elkhair Voluntary Organization
impact.hero_subtitle: Measurable results. Real communities. Lasting change.
impact.overview_desc: Since 2009, SEVO has touched thousands of lives across Sudan through our comprehensive programs in water access, women's empowerment, health, and education.
impact.water_desc: Our well projects have provided clean water to over 15,000 people in rural communities, reducing waterborne diseases and saving women hours of daily water collection.
impact.women_desc: Over 1,200 women have completed our vocational training programs, with 70% starting their own businesses or securing employment within a year.
impact.health_desc: Our mobile clinics have provided over 50,000 medical consultations and vaccinations in remote communities without access to healthcare facilities.
impact.education_desc: We've supported 500+ girls to continue their education through scholarships, school supplies, and community learning centers.
impact.story_1_text: After completing our tailoring program, Mariam opened her own shop and now employs three other women from her community.
impact.story_2_text: Before our well project, women walked 3 hours daily for water. Now, the community has clean water at their doorstep.
impact.report_desc: Download our latest annual report for detailed statistics, financial transparency, and stories from the field.

transparency.hero_subtitle: We believe in complete openness about our operations, finances, and impact.
transparency.principle_1_desc: Every donation is tracked and reported. We publish annual financial statements audited by independent accounting firms.
transparency.principle_2_desc: Regular updates from the field, detailed project reports, and open communication with our donor community.
transparency.principle_3_desc: Local community committees oversee all projects, ensuring resources reach those who need them most.
transparency.contact_desc: We're happy to answer any questions about our operations, finances, or programs.

contact.page_title: Contact & Donate - SEVO | Simat Elkhair Voluntary Organization
contact.hero_subtitle: Get in touch. We'd love to hear from you.
contact.donate_desc: Every donation, no matter the size, helps us continue our work empowering Sudanese women and communities.
contact.donate_note: All donations are tax-deductible. You will receive a receipt via email.
contact.faq_1_a: 90% of donations go directly to our programs. 10% covers administrative costs. Detailed breakdowns are in our annual reports.
contact.faq_2_q: Can I donate in other currencies?
contact.faq_2_a: Yes, we accept donations in multiple currencies including SDG, EUR, and GBP. Contact us for details.
contact.faq_3_a: Visit our contact page and select 'Volunteer' as the subject. We'll get back to you with opportunities.
